dict.acceptation: 真正；精确地，正确地；忠实的，诚实地；正当地；

sent.orig: The heart that has truly loved never forgets but as truly loves on to the close.
sent.trans: 真正爱过的心永不会忘却而且将真爱到生命的尽头。

sent.orig: Truly, compares other members the big fellow, this young fellow appears very small truly.
sent.trans: 确实，相比其他队员的大块头，这位小将确实显得很小。

sent.orig: He is truly rich who desires nothing and he is truly poor who covets all.
Is unable to againstflow is truly the time, is unable to recover is truly the memory.
sent.trans: 真正无法逆行的是时光、真正无法追回的是记忆。

sent.orig: The truly generous is the truly wise.
